title: The best ginger cake
ingredients: ['450g plain flour', '5 teaspoons ground ginger', '1 tablespoon ground nutmeg', '2 teaspoons ground cinnamon', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '150g unsalted butter', '250g caster sugar', '150g runny honey', '150g black treacle', '75g mixed peel or finely chopped dried apricots', '75g chopped crystallised ginger', '100g almonds for decorating the top of cake']
